content: >this beautiful piece has been a long time favorite it s a traditional style with contemporary color shades that work in many home decorating schemes coats & clark this pattern was reworked by tracie barrett for coats & clark in 2010 the new version lw2242 was made available online at the coats & clark website and the ravelry entry for that pattern may be seen here 1 skill level easy materials main color black - 24 ounces color a mint - 6 ounces color b lavender - ounces color c kiwi - 6 ounces color d light periwinkle - 6 ounces color e cornmeal - 5 ounces color f skipper blue - 5 ounces color g raspberry - 5 ounces 4 skeins of one color and one skein each of six other colors video tutorial 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spectrum-throw 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=nqosmerkszi
